user_query: I'm planning a family vacation and I want to find the best deals on hotels and attractions. Can you provide me with a list of all available coupons for travel and accommodations? Additionally, I would like to view an API affirmation in HTML format to boost my confidence in using APIs.

TaskList.description: Search for available hotel deals for family vacations.
Search for attractions and activities deals at the chosen destination.
Retrieve a list of available coupons for hotels and attractions.
Generate an API affirmation in HTML format to build user confidence.
